reviews.text: Fairly decent hotel. A bit difficult to get to. If you're coming off I-85 north, you have to U-turn at Horizon drive and come back to turn on Celebration. Traffic in this area is always heavy, so be prepared. The hotel is located down the hill behind the Comfort Inn.
reviews.title: Decent hotel, but beware of road noise

reviews.text: Service was good. Price was okay - normal rate is high for this hotel, in my opinion, but I caught a sale which put it into a more appropriate category. Free wifi (although it's pretty slow - speedtest showed 1mb down). Free breakfast in the morning is decent.
reviews.title: Just OK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Be aware, this hotel backs up to the Interstate. If you are a light sleeper, bring earplugs, because road noise is audible in the rooms (at least those on the back side of the hotel).
reviews.title: Not so great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for one night on the way back from a trip and it's just OK. The "suite" consisted on two double beds and a space with an additional sofa. No rooms with queen sizes beds were (or even are) available.
reviews.title: Oh my aching back!

reviews.text: It's just OK. A little dated but clean enough and better than some others in the Comfort family. The chain appears to have standardized the breakfasts and they are terrible.
reviews.title: Never again!
